name: Explosive Power
description: Train internal energy and whole-body coordination to generate maximum force.

cards.title: Fa Jin Training
cards.description: A practice for developing sudden explosive energy release.
bulletpoints: Relax the muscles before each strike
Generate power from the ground up
Snap movements quickly to create an explosive effect
cards.summaryText: Soften first, then drive fa jin from the floor and crack it out in a single beat.

cards.title: Coiling Force Application
cards.description: A technique that stores energy through coiling motions before release.
bulletpoints: Twist the torso to build up kinetic energy
Release power through a snapping motion
cards.summaryText: Spiral the torso to store energy, then uncoil in one smooth snap without stiffness.
